summary: Completed comprehensive testing of ARC Project Management System. All backend APIs working correctly with 100% success rate. Frontend functionality fully operational with proper authentication, role-based access control, and all CRUD operations working.
passed_tests: Authentication for all three roles (CEO, Finance, Operations)
User management (get all users, create users with role restrictions)
Task CRUD operations (create, read, update status)
Role-based access control (CEO/Operations can create users, Finance cannot)
Navigation between all pages (Dashboard, Projects, Task Board, Team)
Kanban task board with 4 columns (To Do, In Progress, Review, Done)
Task status updates via quick action buttons
Project creation modal and form submission
Task creation modal and form submission
Responsive UI with proper styling and branding
